changeSet.author: kpenev
changeSet.comment: Update configurations - change uri to id
changeSet.sql: update seip_configurations set config_value = replace(config_value, 'compact_header,', '') where id in ('solr.runtime.dashlet.all.fl', 'solr.search.ftsearch.basic.fq', 'solr.runtime.links.fl', 'solr.search.ftsearch.query');

update seip_configurations set config_value = replace(config_value, 'breadcrumb_header,', '') where id in ('solr.runtime.dashlet.all.fl', 'solr.search.ftsearch.basic.fq', 'solr.runtime.links.fl', 'solr.search.ftsearch.query');

update seip_configurations set config_value = replace(config_value, 'default_header,', '') where id in ('solr.runtime.dashlet.all.fl', 'solr.search.ftsearch.basic.fq', 'solr.runtime.links.fl', 'solr.search.ftsearch.query');

changeSet.author: kpenev
changeSet.comment: Update configurations - remove _sort_ prefixes form configurations
changeSet.sql: update seip_configurations set config_value = replace(config_value, '_sort_', '') where id in ('solr.runtime.dashlet.all.fl', 'solr.search.ftsearch.basic.fq', 'solr.runtime.links.fl', 'solr.search.ftsearch.query');

changeSet.author: bbonev
changeSet.comment: Fix cache configurations scope. The cache provider should be system configuration
changeSet.sql: delete from seip_configurations where id = 'cache.provider.class'; insert into seip_configurations(id, tenant_id, config_value) values('cache.provider.class', 'system.tenant', 'com.sirma.itt.cmf.cache.InfinispanCacheProvider');

changeSet.author: akunchev

preConditions.onFailMessage: Version content handling date already defined

changeSet.comment: Add temporary configuration which will be the date, when the new content handling for the version is added to the system
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO seip_configurations (id, tenant_id, config_value) VALUES ('version.content.handling.enabled.date', 'system.tenant', TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ'));

changeSet.author: akunchev

preConditions.onFailMessage: Date for enabling revert operation is already defined

changeSet.comment: Adds configuration which will be the date, when the revert functionality is added to the system. It is used to filter the revert operation for older version, because there are few issues with them
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO seip_configurations (id, tenant_id, config_value) VALUES ('version.revert.operation.enabled.date', 'system.tenant', TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ'));

changeSet.author: akunchev

preConditions.onFailMessage: Date for enabling revert operation is not defined

changeSet.comment: Updates the configuration for revert with correct time, because the insert does not get it in 00-23 time zone, but 01-12 which causes unwanted behaviour for the functionality
changeSet.sql: UPDATE seip_configurations SET config_value = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"') WHERE id='version.revert.operation.enabled.date';
